SimilarGroups.SimilarityNote: All these requirements emphasize the need for a user-friendly interface that accommodates varying technical abilities among older adults.

UnifiedRequirement.Name: User-Friendly Interface
UnifiedRequirement.Description: The system shall provide an intuitive and user-friendly interface that accommodates older adults with varying technical abilities, ensuring ease of navigation and interaction across all functionalities.

UnifiedRequirement.Name: Customizable Privacy Settings
UnifiedRequirement.Description: Users shall be able to customize their privacy settings to control what personal information and health data are shared with caregivers and how it is utilized, with clear explanations provided in accessible language.

UnifiedRequirement.Name: Voice Command Scheduling
UnifiedRequirement.Description: The system shall enable users to schedule virtual gatherings with friends or family using simple voice commands, ensuring ease of use for older adults who may struggle with technology.
